data.text: Our rooms, amenities, and hotel area was very tidy and well kept. The rooms were spacious and staff were welcoming. I would visit again. We had breakfast at the hotel's breakfast bar where there were many options and varieties of food to cater to all.
data.title: Great Stay

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear F1591HKpb,

Greetings from The Canvas Dubai - MGallery Hotel Collection and thank you for sharing your feedback with us.

Thank you for your kind words regarding your recent stay at our hotel. We are delighted to hear that you found our rooms, amenities, and hotel area to be tidy and well-maintained. It is wonderful to know that you enjoyed the spacious rooms and experienced a warm welcome from our staff. We are pleased that you had a satisfying breakfast experience at our breakfast bar with a variety of food options. 

We look forward to welcoming you back for another enjoyable stay in the future. Thank you for choosing our hotel.

Warm Regards
Ankush Kaul
General Manager
owner_response.author: Ankush Kaul

data.text: The stay was amazing the service staff from breakfast was excellent thanks to whole service and kitchen team for providing amazing food special thanks to hridoy swaroop Sonu rajak mingmar mona and Nisha for nice service and thanks to amazing hostess shokista and Sarawat for guidance and special thanks to kitchen staff ikram and adeena deepak Sunil
data.title: Fantastic food and hotel

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Mr. Landgebharat,

Greetings from The Canvas Dubai - MGallery Hotel Collection and thank you for sharing your feedback with us.

Thank you for your kind words regarding your stay with us. We are delighted to hear that you had an amazing experience and that our service staff, especially Hridoy, Swaroop, Sonu, Rajak, Mingmar, Mona, and Nisha, provided excellent service. We will be sure to pass on your appreciation to them. Additionally, we are grateful for your recognition of our hostess Shokista and Sarawat for their guidance, as well as our kitchen staff Ikram, Adeena, Deepak, and Sunil for providing delicious meals. We look forward to welcoming you back in the future.

Warm Regards
Ankush Kaul
General Manager
owner_response.author: Ankush Kaul

data.text: The canvas is an amazing hotel with a different design, staff is very friendly and helful rooms are clean , things are in place, hotel is clean rooftop view is very nice you can see city building easily, everyone is available for all kind of help, will be back soon
data.title: Nice

data.text: In Ramadan they got me some food for suhoor, very polite. Food is very good. Especially the chef of the kitchen and the employee Agostinho were giving a lot of effort so I'm fine. Hotel employees in total were very nice. I would visit the hotel another time 👍🏼
data.title: Very nice employees and service

data.text: During my recent stay at your hotel, I was thoroughly impressed by the housekeeping service. The room was clean and spacious. It was evident that the housekeeping staff takes great pride in their work. I highly recommend this hotel to anyone seeking a spotless and comfortable stay.
data.title: Great Housekeeping

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear 873Purans,

Greetings from The Canvas Dubai - MGallery Hotel Collection!

Providing a clean and comfortable environment for our guests is our top priority, and we are thrilled to know that we were able to meet your expectations. Your recommendation means a lot to us.

 we look forward to welcoming you back for another enjoyable stay in the future.
